Message: Improvements for Designer/Server communication, security and configuration persistence
ReleaseNote:
# Xtract Universal 3.0

This release includes major changes related to the communication between Xtract Universal Server and Xtract Universal Designer. Transport security and access control has been improved. The file format and folder structure for persisting extractions, sources, destinations, logs, etc. has undergone major changes as well.

## Designer/Server Communication

* Transport security has been improved - Kerberos and TLS 1.1/1.2 are supported now
* Active Directory single-sign on is supported
* Active Directory logon uses Kerberos instead of LDAP (breaking change)

## Access Control

* Individual server permission for custom users
* Individual read/write permission for extractions and sources
* Support for Active Directory groups (breaking change: AD users can no longer be member of an XU user group)

## Files/Folders/Persistence

The config directory uses a new structure for files and folders. Existing configurations (extractions, sources, destinations etc.) can be converted to the new format during setup, or manually by running ConfigConverter.exe from the XU program directory.

Updated EULA
Improvements for error handling (classic RFC)
Adjustments for FIPS compliance
Fixed text encoding of TIDs (NWRFC)
Added support for setting SNCSettings.OwnName on client connections
Added support for qRFC (NetWeaver libraries only)
Fix for SSTRING length
Hierarchy lookup - fix for empty language
Performance improvements
Updated to 5.7.6.0
Improved error and info dialogs
Updated to 5.7.4.0
Fix for langauge key during lookup
Fix for uppercase column names
Updated to 5.7.3.0
Enabled custom order by for compression feature
Fix for checking program Id
Fix for selections on columns that are not part of the result
Hierarchy backward-compatibility: Fix for legacy date selection
Hierarchy metadata retrieval: Fix for date selection
Hierarchy lookup now also selects version
Fix for reading max. connections from QSENDDEST on old systems
Fix for casing of SSIS variables (broken since 3.1.6)
Improved logging
Fixes & improvements for RFC destination Unicode check
Server pool is re-used for sequential extractions
Some case-sensitivity fixes (source/target system, gateway host/service)
Fix for ArgumentNullException in rare cases
Fix for custom function without compression
Fixes for error dialog
Hierarchy: Backward-compatibility fix (broken since 3.1.1)
Fix for legacy hierarchy detection
Changed request Id format to REQU_pppppppp_yyyyMMddHHmmss to support SAP BW export data sources
Updated ERPConnect to 5.6.0.0
Fixes for GUI scaling
Improved error dialogs
Fix for errors during hierarchy lookup
Fixed the issue in table component with column lengths of raw datatypes
Improved error message of pool connections.

Added support for SNC with load balancing
Updated to 5.5.6.0
Fix for standard area
Fix for automatic column detection
Added JSON serialization for Table, Query & Hierarchy. Various fixes & improvements.
